column17:
A watch for men is surely a great attraction and a must-have! Brought to you by Riedenschild this watch is engineered with a chronograph movement. It features a round case that add to its classic appeal. With a metal silver strap this watch is the perfect thing to lend some attitude and composure to your casual attire.

Features
  • Brand: Riedenschild
  • Category: Timepieces
  • For: Men
  • Usage: Casual
  • Case material: Stainless steel
  • Case colour: Silver Black
  • Case shape: Round
  • Band/Strap colour: Silver
  • Band/Strap material: Stainless steel
  • Dial colour: Black
  • Closure: Clasp fastening
  • Water resistant: Up to 20m
  • Type/Movement: Chronograph Quartz

Care Tips Clean your watch at least twice a week with a soft dry cloth. Avoid direct contact with solvents detergents perfumes cosmetics alcohols etc. Remove your watch before you lift heavy objects or do any heavy physical work.

Note: 2 year manufacturer warranty for the product. All products sold on Yebhi are brand new and 100% genuine.
